AppPush.Title: [EN] Honkai: Star Rail Preload
AppPush.Message: Honkai: Star Rail will release on April 26th 2023. Collapse brings preloading support as well as game support starting from April 23th 2023. Check it out by selecting it in the dropdown! Please keep in mind that this is released in Beta first to iron out any bugs and will not have feature parity with other games supported by the launcher. May this journey lead us starward!

AppPush.Title: [EN] Collapse Codename: Version Kiana patch (v1.69.14) is up!
AppPush.Message: The new v1.69.14 patch is up with some hotfixes for Honkai: Star Rail support. If you're looking for downloading the Honkai: Star Rail pre-load, please update your launcher to v1.69.14 to avoid issues.

AppPush.Title: [EN] Collapse v1.69.14 - Codename: Version Kiana has arrived!
AppPush.Message: Thank you for using Collapse over the last 2 years. You guys are awesome! Click "Visit Release Notes Page" button below to see what's new!

RegionPush.Title: [EN] Regarding Issues with Collapse on Genshin Impact 3.6 Update
RegionPush.Message: Collapse 1.69.14 - Codename: Version Kiana was released. Please update to the latest version to ensure that you can continue playing Genshin Impact if you are updating from version 3.5 or earlier. This is to ensure that Collapse is able to properly update your game and prevent many of the issues present on previous Collapse versions. Thanks!

RegionPush.Title: [EN] Seele Character Trailer - "Uneventful Night"
RegionPush.Message:
"Sometimes a sharp blade is the only way to get people to come to their senses."

Hey, Trailblazers! Today we have the character preview for Seele.
